item.title: My Ultimate Windows and Mac Setup (2021 Edition)

item.description: Introduction My Battle Station @ 2021 In a parallel world, I’ll be just using 1 device and 1 Operating system for all the things.

item.title: How to disable auto-locking of MacOS Keychains
item.author: michael@datachain.consulting (Michael John Peña)
item.description: Signing an iOS app for release is one of the trivial things most mobile developers face. A lot of CLIs and SAAS emerged as part of this struggle.
